Detailed Description

Button class

Parameters:
x The x-coordinate of the button.
y The y-coordinate of the button.
imageNormal image for not no focus situation.
imageFocus image for focus situation.
y The y-coordinate of the button.
width The width of the button.
height The height of the button.
label The label name of the button.
focus The indication that the button is in focus of WiiMote pointer.
rumble The rumble array contain a countdown timer for each WiiMote.
index The index contain a unique number for debugging.
